instructions.da: Drej let til højre mod Destination 1
instructions.en: Make a slight right towards Destination 1
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ete dekstren direkte al Destination 1
instructions.es: Gira a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la izquierda hacia Destination 1
instructions.fr: Tourner légèrement à droite en direction de Destination 1
instructions.hu: Forduljon enyhén jobbra a Destination 1 irányába
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kanan menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Fai una leggera curva a destra verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: 斜め右に曲がり、Destination 1へ向かう
instructions.ko: 약간 우회전 하신 후 Destination 1로 가세요.
instructions.my: Destination 1ဆီသို့ ညာဘက်အနည်းငယ်ချိုးကွေ့ပါ
instructions.no: Sving svakt til høyre mot Destination 1
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo w łagodny zakręt na Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva suave a direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Vire ligeiramente à direita em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Virați ușor la dreapta spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните направо в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sl: Zavijte rahlo desno v smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde sağa hafif dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть плавно праворуч у напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên phải về Destination 1
instructions.yo: Ṣe diẹ si ọtun si ọna Destination 1
